body.name: Giantex 8 Cube Bookcase, Freestanding 3-Tier Open Bookshelf, Modern Storage Display Cabinet, Wood Cube Storage Organizer for Living Room, Kid’s Room, Natural
features: [ 8-Cube Bookcase ]: There are 2 large cubes measuring 23” x 12” x 10.5” and 6 small cubes measuring 15” x 12” x 10.5” to facilitate effective display and classification of various daily items, such as books, photos, and decorations. In addition, the wide cabinet top provides additional storage space for odds and ends.

[ Multipurpose Storage Cabinet ]: This well-designed 3-tier bookcase measuring 48” x 12.5” x 36.5” boasts great adaptability, serving great as a bookcase and display cabinet, etc. In addition, the bookshelf combines functionality and versatility into one, making it an eye-catching furniture for living room, kid’s room, office and study.

[ Non-slip Foot Pads ]: Made of thick engineered wood and MDF, the bookshelf is characterized by great sturdiness and long-lasting performance. Plus. the smooth tabletop is against slight scratches. And non-slip foot pads at the bottom can effectively prevent the floor from getting damaged.

[ Modern Style White Bookcase ]: The combination of sleek lines, minimalist style and elegant appearance make this bookcase an aesthetically-piece in your home, which can well integrate into various home decorations and styles. More, this modern bookshelf will further enhance your life quality and show your great taste.

[ Effortless Assembly & Maintenance ]: All required accessories and hardware are in the package. Giantex bookcase is easy to assemble under the guidance of detailed instruction. In addition, smooth surface is convenient to clean, saving much effort and time in daily maintenance.
body.description: Description: If you are looking for a favored storage cabinet to keep your stuffs clean and tidy, our bookcase is your great option. There are 8 cubes in total to store and display daily supplies in different sections, which can well suit your storage needs. What’s more, the wide cabinet top is a perfect platform to display some decorative items. Crafted of durable engineered wood and MDF, this bookshelf is sturdy and reliable for long-term use. With simple and modern design, this 3-tier bookshelf adds highlight to living room, kid’s room, bedroom, and study. It is a practical storage solution to organize your clutter, whether used as a bookcase and display shelving. Features: 8 cubes provide abundant storage space for daily items The wide cabinet top is a perfect platform to display collections Premium engineered wood and MDF feature durability and sturdiness Non-slip foot pads protect the floor from being scratched Simple and modern design matches well with home decoration Work great as a bookcase, storage cabinet and display shelving, etc Suitable for living room, kid’s room, bedroom, and study, etc Smooth cabinet top is easy to clean and maintain Easy to assemble under the guidance of detailed instruction Specifications: Color: Natural Material: Engineered Wood, MDF Overall Dimension: 48'' x 12.5'' x 36.5'' (L x W x H) Dimension of Large Cube: 23'' x 12'' x 10.5'' (L x W x H) Dimension of Small Cube: 15'' x 12'' x 10.5'' (L x W x H) Net Weight: 72.5 lbs Weight Capacity of Top: 132 lbs Weight Capacity of Each Cube: 44 lbs Package Includes: 1 x Bookcase 1 x User Guide

productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 189 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

productInformation.value: #151,760 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #386 in Bookcases

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality. Strong. Sturdy. Difficult to tip over. Not too hard to put together. It is the perfect size for photo boxes. I'm very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice decorative bookcase
reviews.reviewText: I chose white. Would have liked a cherry option. But it was a good compromise. Wouldhave liked punch out holes for electrical devices. I like how solid it turned out. Lots of parts to put together but worth it. The white is very slightly off white. When it is full of books I really don't notice. I have several variations of white anyway and it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These shelves were easy to assemble and are extremely sturdy. I love that there are extra-wide shelves in addition to the standard width. I have it packed with my scrapbooking supplies and it holds a lot! Very pleased!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Before you begin assembly . . .
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. It is sturdy and looks just like it does in the product description. BUT, be sure and tighten the cam fittings securely in each step of the assembly!!!!!!!!!!!! I have a small ratchet tool, which worked amazingly well for tightening these fittings properly.I thought I had a disaster in the making until realizing my mistake. The entire bookshelf collapsed in my first attempt. After disassembling almost the entire product, I began retightening each cam fitting, and the assembly was now simple and intuitive. I think it looks great!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks so high end
reviews.reviewText: Appeared difficult to put together, but was fine after the fact

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size for the price
reviews.reviewText: My daughter pickedout this bookshelf due to the size. She has an aquarium and she needed a good shelf that she could set the aquarium on top of and this shelf makes it perfect. It was really easy to put together, we had no issues with the instructions and it's a beautiful shelf. This really compliments the other furniture in her room. I would absolutely recommend and especially for the price. It's a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars save your original box
reviews.reviewText: This "bookcase" is impossible - it is so flimsy that it cannot be moved - the assembly instructions are clear - movements require two people. I tried to set it upright at the completion of the assembly - I requested that a neighbor help me - we were careful but the case fell apart - it was so damaged that the parts cannot be saved. It was intended to hold books -but I daresay that it is not solid enough to hold books. I suppose it would do for knickknacks-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet is one of my favorite items to buy, I buy it for myself to display my books or clothes. I also buy it to give to my friends, a very practical gift.
Good quality and easy to follow instructions. Still, it took 1.5 hours to assemble.
Easy to put together. Once assembled there is lots of storage space and it looks great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to assemble and well priced
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet was easy to assemble and is study enough for the simple things we plan to store in it. I like how it fills the space and storage baskets easily fit to store items more conspicuously
